author: eyang
msg: HADOOP-5055. Changed alert.conf location from $CHUKWA_HOME/conf/alert.conf to $CHUKWA_CONF_DIR/alert.conf.

author: trawick
msg: fix a race condition between pollset_poll and pollset_remove
T2: pollset_remove called for fd X
T1: port_getn returns event for fd X, kernel disassociates from port
T2: moves ring element for fd X from query ring to dead ring
T1: moves ring element for fd X to add ring, assuming still on query ring

msg: Fixed:  BUILDR-263: package(:war).merge not working correctly with exclude()

msg: o notes on the repository interface
